description:
Designed to help skiers with mid-height arches put the power down. The better your boots fit your feet, the more efficient you can be, and the longer you get to enjoy the snow. Boot Doc insoles provide cushioning and stability inside ski and snowboard boots.

  • Microfibre top layer has an antimicrobial treatment to prevent stinky boots
  • Large forefoot pad provides improved dampening, focused on the 5th metatarsal
  • Flex zones across the arch promote natural movement
  • Shock absorbers in heel and forefoot and a stabilizer layer in the heel provide a supportive base
  • Improved heel cup
  • Best for skiers and riders with medium arches
name: Boot Doc Comfort Mid Arch Insoles - Unisex
